name: Nutritionaide
0:
”Alexa, ask nutrition aide what is in an Avocado”
”Alexa, ask nutrition aide Is Bok Choy good for me”
”Alexa, ask nutrition aide apple health”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nutrition aide
des:
This skill allows a user to perform a rapid evaluation of the nutritional composition of almost any food. The output includes calories, total fat content, fiber, protein, sugar, sodium and saturated fat. Fat, fiber, protein, sugar, and saturated fat contents are given in grams. (g) Sodium content is given in milligrams. (mg)

An example question that you can ask is, "What is in an Avocado?" Another example is, "Is Bok Choy good for me?" Feel free to give this skill a try, it doesn't have any software or hardware prerequisites!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
